title: Getting permanently banned without any informations or reasons
body:
Yesterday, monday 20th november.. I was playing... after playing 5-6 games, at the last game when the game ended right when the client  oppened at the honor screen I got a message saying "Ure account has been suspended Re-log for more informations, when I tried to re connect I got a message "Ure account has been permanently suspended check the email ...." I checked the email I got a message as a spam telling me that I didnt respect league of legends term of use and .... still dont know what I did wrong.. Contacted the league of legends support all I got is a message saying that they cant disscus this and my account wont be unbanned... still no reasons, because I was sure that I didnt did any bad thing and respected everything even thoo lets say for flamme, my friend got a 14 days ban for flamme but at least he got the chat logs and what he did..
I totally got no informations, I did nothing I swear god after working hard years and paying a lot of money, sometimes I think that league of legends support are not humans they don't feel you, they are like robots... Did nothing, getting banned just like that... A thousands hours playing and working and everything gone just like that

replies.body: Hey there, I don't have a lot of visibility over EU support but your account was **not **locked for an in-game behavioral issue. If you have a ticket number I can check into this for you.  You'll still want to speak with the specialist in your ticket for further context.

I sent a ticket but like I said the player supp said "were not reversing our decision accounts that are banned they are banned..." and said he is "not able to disscuss this" and "if you have any questions that are not related with this thing I can create another request" but I dont know what he means by that, My questions will only be about this ban.... I don't even know what I did wrong.. My account got hacked last mounth but I changed the password immediatly, Im thinking maybe that guy did something, he sent some fake links to my friend list I really dont know but I really want&need my account back...

they use to send us the logs of the games that decided the perma ban, but they removed that feature because machines perma you now and not actual workers, its based on the amount of times you get reported so eventually, u get perma banned if you play alot.

I didnt flame, but lets say I did..
I just got 2 chat resstruction in all so I dont think they will move from chat bans immedtialy to perma ban, I think 2 14 days ban then perma.
